name: Ragnarök Rollout
description:
Created for Godot Wild Jam #42 with the theme "Ancient". 

Click the screen to dash towards the mouse. Try to get as many stars as you can and the shortest time possible!

Native builds are provided in case the web version doesn't run well for you. The OSX build is unsigned, so you will have to find a work around for that if you want to run the game on Mac.
